content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of:
- 3 Stone furnaces at positions (1,1), (3,1), (5,1)
- 3 Burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5), (3.5,2.5), (5.5,2.5)
- 3 Wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5), (3.5,3.5), (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Consists of:
- 2 Stone furnaces at positions (2,7), (4,7)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5), (4.5,8.5)
- 2 Wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5), (4.5,9.5)
- 1 Burner inserter for chest-to-chest transfer at (3.5,9.5)
- Belt system connecting furnace outputs

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position x=11.5-14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Output chest at (11.5,14.5)
- Burner inserters at (14.5,12.5) and (12.5,14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Area (Position x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)
- Input chests at (21.5,11.5), (21.5,12.5)
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with class imports
- Import required classes explicitly from factorio_entities module before using them
- For chest operations, use: from factorio_entities import Chest

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple inserters and furnaces show "waiting for source items" warnings
- Ensure proper item flow between connected entities
- Check if input materials are available for assembling machines

### Fluid System Warnings
- One offshore pump shows "No fluid present in connections" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections between fluid-handling entities

### Production Chain Issues
- Electronic circuit production is stalled due to missing ingredients (iron plates and copper cables)
- Ensure all required materials are being supplied to assembling machines
